item.title: Mothers turn in sons to face charges for Florida grade school vandalism
item.description: Two boys allegedly caused $50,000 worth of vandalism damage.

item.title: Endangered orca in Washington state seen carrying a dead calf
item.description: She is carrying her dead newborn calf in an apparent effort to revive it.

item.title: Suspect in home invasions of Macklemore, celebrity athletes pleads not guilty
item.description: Suspect has been held on bail totaling more than $2 million.

item.title: Shipwreck discovered of schooner that sank in Lake Michigan almost 140 years ago
item.description: Searchers have discovered the wreckage of a schooner that sank during a Lake Michigan storm almost 140 years ago

item.title: Global shares trade mixed as markets eye Fed decision
item.description: Wall Street inched a tad higher as markets look ahead to what most expect will be an interest rate cut by the U.S. Federal Reserve later this week
